    Steve's Memo Template

    memo.Rd

    A template for memos. For more information, see here: http://svmiller.com/blog/2019/06/r-markdown-memo-template/.

    Usage

    memo(...)

templ_memo()

    Arguments

    ...

    Arguments to rmarkdown::pdf_document.

    About YAML header fields

    This section documents some of the YAML fields to know for this template.

    FIELDDESCRIPTION
    fromname of the author
    tothe intended recipient
    subjectthe title of the memo
    datethe date of the memo
    memorandumlogical. If TRUE, includes MEMORANDUM on top of the memo
    graphicslogical. If TRUE, allows for graphic logo on memo
    widthadjustable with for logo, if graphics: TRUE
    logopositionposition of logo, if graphics: TRUE
    logofile for logo, if graphics: TRUE

    On this page
